rukus.text: imaan waalo aur nek kaam waalo ko Allah taâ€™ala un jannato mein le jayega, jin ke daraqto ta le se nehre lehre le rahi hai, jahaan wo sone ke kangan pehnaaye jayenge aur sacche moti bhi, wahaan un ka libaas qaalis resham hoga
un ko paakiza baath ki rehnumaayi kar di gayi aur qaabile sadh tareef raah ki hidaayath kar di gayi

jin logo ne kufr kiya aur Allah ki raah se rokne lage aur us hurmath waali masjid se bhi, jise hum ne tamaam logo ke liye masaawi kar diya hai, waheen ke rehne waale ho, ya baaher ke ho, jo bhi zulm ke saath wahaan ilhaadh2 ka iraada kare, hum ose dard naak azaab chakayene
